ml:body.p: There are a bunch of us here at MarkLogic thinking about things that would make it easier to interact with the browser, and in particular, JSON. Beyond the existing support that MarkLogic provides with the xdmp:to-json() and xdmp:from-jon() API calls, we've tossed around a number of ideas. I wanted to share something that Jason Booth, one of our top-notch Consultants has whipped up.
